name: Climatic
description:
Welcome to Climatic! 

This is a fast paced simulation game! You, as the manager of this chaotic island, need to guide the local residents to constantly avoid disasters such as fires, snowstorms, and possibly sea level rise.

Controls are pretty much fully mouse based. Left click to execute actions, Right click, hold, and drag to look around the map, and Scroll to zoom in-n-out. ESC key to pause

Once the population reaches 0, the temperature drops below -15°c, or goes above 45°c, you will lose your job... So beware! 

  • Houses generate coins, increase the population, and also increase temperature moderately.
  • Fires increase the temperature drastically, but they can't spread through dirt.
  • Snow decreases the temperature drastically, and it spreads like fire but slower.
  • Trees can help decrease the temperature moderately.
  • Grass can also help decrease the temperature but slimly.
  • Dirt is neutral, but it will turn into grass automatically in a certain amount of time.

How long will you survive in this catastrophic disastrous Island? Good luck!
